    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static ButtonResource getInstance()

      • handleGET

        public void handleGET(org.eclipse.californium.core.server.resources.CoapExchange exchange)
        Methods to get data by Get method. It should have a query string type with two parameters for passing values in the get method. The value of the first parameter is "button" and the value of the second parameter is "on" or "off".
        Overrides:
        handleGET in class org.eclipse.californium.core.CoapResource
        Parameters:
        exchange -

      • handlePOST

        public void handlePOST(org.eclipse.californium.core.server.resources.CoapExchange exchange)
        Methods to get data by Post method. This should be a String of Json type with two Keys and Values. The first key should be "sensor" and the Value should be "button". The second key should be "status" and the Value should be "on" or "off".
        Overrides:
        handlePOST in class org.eclipse.californium.core.CoapResource
        Parameters:
        exchange -
